name: The Text That Never Ends - SMS Prank App
name_original: The Text That Never Ends - SMS Prank App
description:
This app sings "The Text That Never Ends" by SMS to your friends as a fun prank! Each SMS text message is one verse from the song!

Includes a timer! Simply select a contact from your android phone and boom!

This is the text that doesn't end! Yes it goes on and on my friend! Some people, started sending it not knowing what it was, and they'll continue sending it forever just because...

Select how many messages to send, adjust the timer and go! Super easy! Amazingly fun!

Other Android Apps By Kevin Loring

Big Thank You To My Fans at Reddit! Much Appreciation!

If you like this app, check out Master Blaster!

https://kevinloring.itch.io/sms-master-blaster
